mapper.select: select * from visit order by idx DESC
mapper.insert: insert into visit values( seq_visit_idx.nextVal, #{name}, #{content}, #{pwd}, #{ip}, sysdate, #{filename} )
mapper.delete: delete from visit where idx=#{idx} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.update: update visit set content=#{content}, pwd = #{pwd}, ip = #{ip}, regdate = sysdate where idx = #{idx}
